channel.title: broadband on PR
channel.description: Recent content in broadband on PR

item.title: Configuring your Airtel Broadband DSL with your modem + wifi router
item.description: My modem failed last week(frequent drops), and I was not willing to repair this time. I’ve taken a screenshots of configuration from my old modem, with the help I was able to configure my new D-Link 2750u.

item.title: Airtel Broadband - How to find bandwidth usage
item.description: If you would like to keep tabs on your bandwidth usage? http://122.160.230.125:8080/gbod/gb_on_demand.do It is good to know your usage, the 10GB fair usage plan from Airtel is peanut for my usage as I download a lot of TED & iOS Dev videos from iTunes.
